alert.note: Alert for Block Island (Rhode Island) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued February 03 at 2:59AM EST until February 04 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 1 PM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills and strong winds expected. Wind chills dropping to between 15 and 25 below zero. Northwest wind gusts between 35 and 50 mph. * WHERE...In Massachusetts, Dukes and Nantucket Counties. In Rhode Island, Block Island. * WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 1 PM EST Saturday. The lowest wind chills will occur tonight into mid-morning Saturday. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Northwest wind gusts between 35 and 50 mph may lead to isolated power outages.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
